name: Big Poe
description: Boss fight against the Big Poe.

fields.name: Spotlight 1 Trigger Variable
fields.description: The local variable that triggers the first spotlight in the Big Poe fight.

fields.name: Spotlight 2 Trigger Variable
fields.description: The local variable that triggers the second spotlight in the Big Poe fight.

fields.name: Spotlight 3 Trigger Variable
fields.description: The local variable that triggers the third spotlight in the Big Poe fight.

fields.name: Spotlight 4 Trigger Variable
fields.description: The local variable that triggers the fourth spotlight in the Big Poe fight.

fields.name: Low Life Difficulty Variable
fields.description: The variable to be set when Big Poe has low life to increase the difficulty of the fight.

fields.name: Unknown Variable 6
fields.description: An unknown variable that is set to 124 in specific conditions.
